cast.original_title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
cast.overview: When the bumbling Lieutenant Frank Drebin investigates events following the shooting of his partner, he stumbles upon an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.
cast.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
cast.character: "Mr. Pallazzo! Would you come with me?"

details.biography: Jeff Wright was born on 2 February 1960 in Reno, Nevada, USA. He was an actor and writer, known for The Naked Gun 2½: The Smell of Fear (1991), The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad! (1988) and Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult (1994). He died on 20 July 2020 of cancer in Los Angeles, California, USA.
details.name: Jeff Wright
